title: What K-pop song has girls wearing black dresses in a yellow room? - Quora

response.answer_text: I'm not sure if it's Female President by Girls Day or Black Dress by CLC. You can check both of them out to be sure.

A certain series of videos - just not a K-pop one - does come to mind. They’re Japanese advertisements for a brand called Mouse Computer. The Japanese idol group featured in the advertisements is Nogizaka46.
